name: P440
description:
P440 is a minimalist local multiplayer fighting game.

Features:

  • 2 - 4 player local multiplayer + single player mode
  • 4 fighter types
  • local multiplayer + single player mode.
  • homemade music in 11 / 8

Controls:

  • movement with WASD or arrow keys
  • dash attack with SHIFT
  • special attack with E

Four Fighter Types:

Red:

  • dash attack: エクスプロージョン
  • special attack: fireworks

Blue:

  • dash attack: barrier dash
  • special attack: boomerang

Yellow:

  • dash attack: zip
  • special attack: zap

Cyan:

  • dash attack: electric burst
  • special attack: reek

Install Instructions:

  • Windows: extract the zip and run P440.exe (don't take the .exe out of the folder)
